title: Ring of integers
content: According to Wikipedia ("Integer", 25-May-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Integer ) "The integers form a unital ring which is the most basic one, in the following sense: for any unital ring, there is a unique ring homomorphism from the integers into this ring. This universal property, namely to be an initial object in the category of [[unital] rings, characterizes the ring ` Z ` ." In set.mm, there was no explicit definition for the ring of integers until June 2019, but it was denoted by ` ( CCfld |``s ZZ ) ` , the field of complex numbers restricted to the integers. In ~ zringring it is shown that this restriction is a ring (it is actually a principal ideal ring as shown in ~ zringlpir ), and ~ zringbas shows that its base set is the integers. As of June 2019, there is an abbreviation of this expression as definition ~ df-zring of the ring of integers. Remark: Instead of using the symbol "ZZrng" analogous to ` CCfld ` used for the field of complex numbers, we have chosen the version with an "i" to indicate that the ring of integers is a unital ring, see also Wikipedia ("Rng (algebra)", 9-Jun-2019, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rng_(algebra) ).

blocks.name: zringlpirlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ zringlpir . A nonzero ideal of integers contains some positive integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2019.)

  adantr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wne(cv(hs0), nat0), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), c0))

  zcnd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))

  mp3an2i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, zring), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(zring, crg), wcel(c0, cfv(clidl, zring)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))

  eleq1(cfv(cabs, cv(hs0)), cneg(cv(hs0)), c0)

blocks.name: dfprm2
blocks.content: The positive irreducible elements of ` ZZ ` are the prime numbers. This is an alternative way to define ` Prime ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2014.) (Revised by AV, 10-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfprm2(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cprime, cin(cn, c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cir, zring))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, cprime, cin(cn, c0))
  bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cn, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  biadanii(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  prmnn(cv(hs0))
  bicomd(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  prmirredlem(cv(hs0), c0)
  elin(cv(hs0), cn, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cprime)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cn, c0))
}

}

blocks.name: mulgghm2
blocks.content: The powers of a group element give a homomorphism from ` ZZ ` to a group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm mulgghm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(zring, cghm, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, co(zring, cghm, c0)), wa(wcel(zring, cgrp), wcel(c0, cgrp)), wa(wf(c3, cz, c2), wral(hs0, cz, wral(hs1, cz, wceq(cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(c3, cv(hs1))))))))
  jctil(wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(zring, cgrp), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(c1, c2))

blocks.name: mulgrhm2
blocks.content: The powers of the element ` 1 ` give the unique ring homomorphism from ` ZZ ` to a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2019.)

thm mulgrhm2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(zring, crh, c0), csn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmg, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqssd(co(zring, crh, c0), csn(c1), wcel(c0, crg))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(zring, crh, c0), csn(c1), wcel(c0, crg))
  ex(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eqr(cv(hs0), c1, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))))
  eqtrd(cv(hs0), cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, cz, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))))
  feqmptd(s0, cv(hs0), cz, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), cz, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  rhmf(cv(hs0), zring, c0, cz, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  mpteq2dva(s0, cz, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, c3), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))))
  3eqtr3d(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c2, c3), cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, zring), nat1)), co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cv(hs0), nat1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz)), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, zring), nat1)), co(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cv(hs0), nat1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, cghm, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(nat1, cz))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, cghm, c0)))
  rhmghm(cv(hs0), zring, c0)
  simpr(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  1zzd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  ghmmulg(cv(hs0), zring, c0, cv(s0), nat1, cz, cfv(cmg, zring), c2)
  zringbas()
  eqid(cfv(cmg, zring))
  fveq2d(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, zring), nat1), cv(s0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, zring), nat1), cv(s0)))
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, zring), nat1), cv(s0), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, ccnfld), nat1), co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, ccnfld), nat1), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, zring), nat1)), wcel(nat1, cz))
  1z()
  eqtr4d(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, ccnfld), nat1), co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, zring), nat1), co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(nat1, cz)))

  mpan2(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmg, ccnfld), nat1), co(cv(s0), cmul, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  cnfldmulg(cv(s0), nat1)
  zringmulg(cv(s0), nat1)
  mulid1d(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cz)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), nat1), c3))
  rhm1(cv(hs0), zring, c0, nat1, c3)
  zring1()
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  snssd(c1, co(zring, crh, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
  mulgrhm(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(co(zring, crh, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, crg))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, crg)
  diff.crg.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), co(zring, crh, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
